task.title: Rename Session
task.shortdesc: Change a session name in your project.

step.cmd: Right-click (CTRL+click) on the session you wish to rename, and choose Rename Session from the context menu.
step.stepresult: The Rename Session window will appear.

step.cmd: Follow the steps in the Rename Session window and click OK.
step.stepresult: You will be returned to the Project Manager window, with the session renamed.
